nodes.documentation: @dev Default payable function.

devdoc.details: This contract contains the required functions to manage the operations of the store.

addNewItem(string,string,uint256).details: Owner can add items to his/her store to sell.

purchaseItem(uint256,uint256).details: Shoppers call this to purchase a given item from the store.

params.quantity: The number of quantity of the item the user is buying.

toggleContractActive().details: Owner can toggle contract in case of emergency.

updateStockQuantity(uint256,uint256).details: Owner can update the quantity for a given item.

params.newStockQuantity: The updated quantity count of the item.

withdraw().details: Owner can withdraw any funds the store has earned by selling items.

devdoc.title: Store
